stories.text: I would love Heroku's easy deployment way in dirty cheap virtual servers. It looks like Dokku is the name of that. Can anybody share the experience?

stories.text:
It's free to read and it's delivered daily to your inbox. While there are lots of newsletters out there, there are extremely few that focus on business and tech news in Britain/affecting Britain — so if you're interested, subscribe away here! www.venturewrap.com

If you also have any feedback, opinions or comments on what you'd like to see in the newsletter, I'd love to hear it. Always keen to hear feedback from users :)
stories.title: I made a daily newsletter for those interested in British business and tech news
